website_summaries.verdict: This hammer holster is padded a bit to help hold the tool away from your body.
pros: Features a steel handle for the hammer
Durable enough to handle very heavy hammers
Does a good job of holding the hammer even when you are moving around on a work site
cons: Can't quite fit a three-inch belt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and well-made. I use these for rock-hounding and it easily fits all the tools I like to carry: a light rock hammer, a 4-lb crack hammer, a hand shovel, and a spray bottle. Couldn't be happier with how these performed. I was walking in and out of a creek for 4 hours and no problem accessing my tools - and none of them fell out despite all my slipping, stumbling and squatting.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P.

customer_reviews.title: Logo crooked. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star item normally. Everything but one minor detail is excellent. The ‘Dewalt’ logo was sewn on extremely crooked! You might think it is ridiculous to be bothered by this but it’s so crooked it appears a 5 year old did it. I have to wonder why the people that work quality control didn’t stop it from being shipped. I also wonder why the seller bothered to box it and ship it to me?!
customer_reviews.author: Public Name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an addition to my DeWalt belt and it fits perfectly. Very durable design as I put it through hell most days and it hardly shows any wear. Very sturdy design, keeping my hammer in the same position without sliding around. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jason sparks

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this just about every day for a month or two, and there's no sign of wear. Lightweight comfortable and when I sweat on it it dries quickly. Eonline price is about half of weather asking for the same product at the lumber yard down the street.
customer_reviews.author: Don Juan Dubbl

customer_reviews.title: It works well !
customer_reviews.text: I am real funny about where my tools are located on me, I just want to reach and have it in my hand with out taking my eyes off what I am doing, this work very well, I have been useing it quite frequently in the last two weeks, good job. Rev. Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great. Lasts 4-5 years of heavy duty daily use!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite hammer loop holders for my tool belt. I pouch up every day and put this hammer loop through the ringer with the rest of my tools. Highly recommend them to anyone who is curious.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoPickin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction, and wear my bags daily, for hours. If your set didnt come with a belt hammer loop, this is a quality alternative. No complaints. Once you have it where you want it, I would recommend finding a way to secure it, being that it will absolutely move around on your belt, if not.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and as promised. Bottom edge has began to curl snagging the hammer grip. Not a deal breaker but a nuisance. Item is solid and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: this is not a clip on style. you must loop it through a belt. product is durable. it is a bit too big for my preference. overall good product at good price.
customer_reviews.author: SQUiD808

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty I'm glad I bought it. This replaces another brand that broke.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredRoadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Good addition for a tool belt
customer_reviews.text: A good addition to my tool belt, holds my tools well and space for the handle
customer_reviews.author: Neil Anthony

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: would give 5 stars just a pain getting used to it from my old hook
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you don’t need a full up work belt.
customer_reviews.author: CountryLogic

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Well made. Fit on by tool belt no problems. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pawayne

customer_reviews.title: This Is A High Quality And Very Functional Hammer Holder
customer_reviews.text: ~ I ordered this for a buddy who did not have a cordless drill/driver and purchased it with the corresponding belt and holster for the drill. Wow. It really looks great; is made of very high quality materials and extremely functional for always having your drill and hammer available to you in a moments notice during a repair job. Way to go "Amazing-zon"!! ~
customer_reviews.author: Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does what its designed for
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap solution for not having to lay your hammer down when working around the house.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Claw Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Work in retail. Use a handled scanner device. Excellent carry MOD
customer_reviews.author: david taylor

customer_reviews.title: 🔨
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little too wide, but still an easy way to just carry a hammer on your belt.
customer_reviews.author: John Relo

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this metal one because I can pull out the HD hammer faster that a cord and it keeps it secured while I move around.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberfy P.

customer_reviews.title: ... to put her rock hammer in and it works fantastic! It's sturdy and fits on a belt
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister who is a geologist to put her rock hammer in and it works fantastic! It's sturdy and fits on a belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sturdy, well built and it is constructed in a way that the handle of your hammer does not smack against you. Cons: None really/ Other thoughts: If it had a strap to put around your hammer so it doesn't fall out it would be perfect. I am a geologist so I do a lot of climbing around and the strap would give a bit of a piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Casimir Guzowski

customer_reviews.title: very strong
customer_reviews.text: i,ve had many hammer holders before, but the all ripped apart. this dewalt is super strong and will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bob A. Weikl

customer_reviews.title: Versatile hanger
customer_reviews.text: Im using it to hang and carry my bushcraft hatchet
customer_reviews.author: earthwooman

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammer holder.
customer_reviews.text: I used this at work since I would build crates and such things makes it easier than always carrying a hammer by hand! Would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Yepiz

customer_reviews.title: Durable and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't hang it on a tool belt, but hung it on my pants belt. It was a little wide for that, but it worked well. And is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great for rock hounds
customer_reviews.text: Holds rock-hounding chisel or hammer. Very sturdy and we'll made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Irene

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this holster to mount to the waist belt on My PPE. Keeps My hammer close by but doesn’t affect the functionality of the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was after
customer_reviews.text: This hammer holder works very well and will last far longer than the leather ones I've been using. It fits all my hammers well from the 28 oz framing meat tenderizer to the 12 oz finish hammer. I chose this one over the CLC options simply because I thought it'd be a step up, but the tag showed that it is made for DeWalt by CLC, so you could save a few bucks buying a CLC-branded holder. I'm pleased with it anyway, and it should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stitzlein

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but my hammer really rattles around and is kinda loud.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as advertised. Fits all my belts and does a great job of holding my hammer.
customer_reviews.author: OZ4

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: It replaced my old dead leather one and so far it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Hold my hammer, yo.
customer_reviews.text: It holds my hammer and easily fits a 2" belt. Maybe even a 2.5" belt.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Troupe

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: This product is of good quality, I use it every time and it is really solid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No break down after a year off use, Works as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Fastner

customer_reviews.title: A Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea that is well executed. We purchased this to carry belt-mounted tools and found it to be sturdy and flexible enough to fit on multiple belts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, better, best.
customer_reviews.text: Not much you can say about a hammer holster. It does the job and this one is built better than any I've had in thirty years carpentering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holder
customer_reviews.text: This holder does a great job. Very sturdy and is completely out of the way
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Webb

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing is the hammer is swimming very low if ...
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is the hammer is swimming very low if you use it on you back pretty sure gone a hit your legs when you walking
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer holder
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do: holds a hammer and stays on my tool belt
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a smaller attachment to hold my hammer fairly snug and in place. This holder may work perfectly for some people that need easy drop in or pull out action but for me (short stature), it jut swings around too much when I'm doing stuff for it to be handy
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the needy in your life
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Gift for a picky person. Hope they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with item
customer_reviews.text: Strong backing to support onto belt loop. Doesn't sag down. Very happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L

customer_reviews.title: Another great Dewalt product!
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt does it right! This hammer holder is very well built, and the padding makes it comfortable to wear. I'm an electrician, and this is perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: William A. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Got this to match the tape holder. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: bkdk

customer_reviews.title: Hammer holder works great
customer_reviews.text: Hammer holder works great as advertised. Sturdy, big enough to hold a larger hammer, but small enough to accept and any but the smallest hammers. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Torres

customer_reviews.title: A good product. Sense of use are really good
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Sense of use are really good. ... Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: High quality hammer holder. Fits into the Dewalt 5 inch belt perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It holds my hammer nicely. It's very simple in design and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Edris hashimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It holds a hammer great. Not sure what else to say! I expect it will hold up well over the years as it feels really durable.
customer_reviews.author: D2

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily at work. Belt slot is ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily at work. Belt slot is very wide, which for me means my hammer hangs lower than optimal.
customer_reviews.author: Etamnixe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid and light hammer holder. It's single use, unlike others on the market, but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: New Englandah

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It's good to have the hammer positioned where you want it to be, so you can use it to balance your tool belt instead of heavy on one side.
customer_reviews.author: PomeLo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: What can you say it is a hammer holder. It is well made and holds the hammer securely in place
customer_reviews.author: jrod

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: rugged and high quality. That is what I was looking for. I was able to order accessories to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it fast and what i expect it and price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Heavy duty hammer ring with a large belt opening. Intended to be used with a full size hammer.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.text: I use this on a tactical outfit to hold a throwing axe. Excellent and deadly.

customer_reviews.title: seems well made

product_meta.title: DEWALT DG5139 Heavy-duty Hammer Holder
product_meta.description:
DEWALT DG5139 Heavy-duty Hammer Holder

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Heavy-duty hammer holder
feature_bullets: Steel loop cradle helps stabilize hammer
Added padding helps keep handle away from body
Keeps hammer always within reach without hurting your waist
